summary: A standalone and unique ancient elven dagger.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s21.postimg.org/thjop3ghz/headerelven.png[/img]
[size=4]
[/size][center][b][size=4]NOTE: YOU'RE NOT ALLOWED TO USE THIS MOD TO MAKE A PROFIT
OR UPLOAD IT ON STEAM.[/size]

[/b][/center]

This mod adds a special ancient elven dagger in game.
There are two versions: one is craftable at Skyforge once you have the elven smithing perk, the other is in the Thalmor's embassy (which is more powerful and has a unique enchantment).
This dagger was at first implemented in my other mod (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54961/), but then I decided to make a standalone version.
[b][i]NOTE: This is a very old modder's resource, I changed the textures and put it in game.[/i][/b]

[b][i]REQUIREMENTS: None. Just Skyrim.[/i][/b]


[b]INSTALL[/b]
Drop the content of the zipped file into your Skyrim/Data folder.
Remember to activate it through the Skyrim Launcher, and let BOSS sort the load order for you.
PLEASE FOLLOW THE INSTALLATION PROCEDURE AS SUGGESTED, DON'T BLAME ME FOR YOUR ERRORS.

[b]UNISTALL[/b]
Just remove the files.

[b]INCOMPATIBILITY[/b]
None that I'm aware of. Tested it with the most popular mods out there.

[b]SUGGESTED MODS[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35789/?]Shadow of Morrowind[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15425/?]Stakado Cinemascope ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54346/?]Insomnia ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4955/?]83Willows 101BugsHD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]

[b]CREDITS[/b]

[/list]
